text:
David A. Zeller (June 8, 1939 – September 3, 2020) was an American professional basketball player. He played college basketball for the Miami RedHawks. He played in the National Basketball Association for the Cincinnati Royals between 1961 to 1962. Zeller was born in New Carlisle, Ohio.
Zeller died on September 3, 2020 in Toledo, Ohio at the age of 81.
